RoleTypeDefinition.name: organizational
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of roles that typically correspond to departments or business units within an organizational hierarchy.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: business
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of users that perform similar functions within the organization. Business Roles are associated with IT Roles or Entitlement Roles to provide specific levels of access to enterprise IT resources.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: it
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of IT entitlements which can be associated with Business Roles to provide users with specific access rights. IT Roles can be constrained to entitlements within a single application or expanded to include entitlements across applications.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: entitlement
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a single IT entitlement necessary to access data or perform a specific action within a target system.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: container
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a generic container for holding roles.

ObjectAttribute.name: nercRelevant
ObjectAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the role impacts NERC standards compliance

ObjectAttribute.name: pciRelevant
ObjectAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the role impacts PCI-DSS standards compliance

ObjectAttribute.name: soxRelevant
ObjectAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the role impacts Sarbanes-Oxley standards compliance

ObjectAttribute.name: isoRelevant
ObjectAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the role impacts ISO27001 standards compliance

ObjectAttribute.name: adminRole
ObjectAttribute.Description: Indicates whether entitlements from this role need to be applied to an administrative, rather than normal account

ObjectAttribute.name: managerApproval
ObjectAttribute.Description: Determines if manager approval is required for this role

ObjectAttribute.name: ownerApproval
ObjectAttribute.Description: Determines if Role Owner approval is required for this role

ObjectAttribute.name: addlApproval
ObjectAttribute.Description: Determines if additional approval is required for this role
